title: Affirmation Poetry for Expectant Mothers
description: An alternate cover edition can be found here.An affirmation on its own is a powerful thing. However, flexing the muscle of an affirmation with the conscious expression of your own words, thoughts and experiences is a transformative thing. Use this affirmational journal to not only absorb the powerful messages in each affirmation, but to accentuate them ten fold by the expressions of your own creation.
author: Elizabeth D. Gray
